entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then rain showers or flurries at times heavy changing to flurries at times heavy in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 late in the morning. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 06:40 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
